(OOC: Scratch the post where Dollen got GoldenEye I see she was already tal=
kting to T-Saur)

::Dollen::

        Dollen wakes up, and runs outside, he=
 sees the Predacon personalitied Maximals.  He starts firing his legs guns =
at Diskus.

(Since Rampage is in control of HB's base, Decadel is not in it=
 anymore ok?)

::Decadel::

      Decadel was sitting in a big, cozy, nice,=
 warm place underground.  It was his newly created secret underground den, =
located in Zambia, Africa.  He hed Hell Drak laying over in a corner.  Deca=
del was reading a book, while keeping a close eye on Hell Drak too.

::Hell=
 Drak::

     Hell Drak didn't find herself in a base somewhere anymore, in=
stead it felt more cavy, warm.  She couldn't open her eyes, and she couldn'=
t speak.  She could only think.....Think about her brother.

       "Brothe=
r!!!  Brother!!!!!!  NOOOOOO!!!!" She screamed silently in her mind, as she=
 saw in her mind Necromancer being beaten by a bunch of mean bullies, as a =
child.  She wanted to wake up, and see her brother, even if she didn't like=
 his weird sense of honour, and the way he always talked, like a Maximal ch=
aracter named Silverbolt.
